intent: I need to run applications that depend on libraries from older versions of CentOS Linux.
I want to set up a minimal CentOS Linux environment required for compute node operation.
I want to identify packages that may cause conflicts when installing all available software on a client system.
I want to enable file sharing and access between Linux and Windows systems using the CIFS protocol.
I want my system interface to display text correctly in multiple languages.
I want to set up a graphical desktop environment that is easy to use and navigate.
I want to create, edit, or manipulate images and graphics on my system.
I want to type and enter text in different languages and scripts on my system.
I want to create, edit, and manage documents, spreadsheets, and presentations on my system.
I want to develop or run applications that use Perl to interact with standard system libraries and features.
I want to run Linux smoothly as a virtual machine on Hyper-V, with all necessary drivers and integration tools.
I want to manage and administer my CentOS Linux system remotely through a web or network interface.
I want to install the essential packages required for building Fedora distributions and deliverables.
I want to install essential applications that integrate well with the Xfce desktop environment.
